reviews.review:
Go ducking learn how to code a game since the reporting system is broken (understand "has never been implemented") no one seems to care about as soooooooo many cheaters have been spotted then reported in the game but ducking noooooooothing to do with it. 

Annnnnnd now this $hit randomly crashes buuut never came across any issue with the shop section hey hey heyyyyyyy. 

Ok, getting a fix or dedicated servers at the very least before summer 2019 would be a great achievement so hey dreaming still is cost-free lmao.

Downvoted. 

When could we expect to get rid of USELESS p2p? 

Waiting for summer 2k19 to come so that we (hopefully) eventually can be playing on dedicated servers that serve the shee.. users (my bad) with a decent latency after 2 years so it finally becomes possible to avoid hosts who download porn while playing this $hit is a shame. 

Enjoy your steam review.

Period.



-----------------------



[h1]<< Update : March, 8th 2019 >>[/h1]


Those AWESOME devs have released a game update! 
That SURPRISINGLY turns out to be a SHOP update! :) :) :)

As a result, DON'T FORGET TO BUY THE LATEST BRAND NEW 90s CLOTHES COLLECTION that is available on the SHOP section! :) :) :)

So, as of today, since the last game session :

[b]- Still we face frequent infinite loading screens (this on a daily basis, forcing the player to kill the game)

- Toxic community but uhh that's been the case since the game release years ago.

- Hosts that unexpectedly disconnect right before starting a game represent a ducking sad reality (that happens on a daily basis as well)

- Having to create a group every time we come back from the previous game that ended ( 2020 is near, really devs? How about finally listening to the community? Rocket League integrated this feature on the very 1st release!)

- When dedicated servers???

YOU CLEARLY LAZY P.O.S DEVS ARE GIVING US THE FINGER but muuuhhh SHOP IS WAY MORE IMPORTANT :) :) :)[/b]

See you soon on next update folks!



-----------------------



Stopped playing this game for a 2-year timeframe (thought devs deceived us for real and for good) since the last update.


[h1]Feedback as of July 12th 2021.[/h1]


[b]- Dedicated servers? Fixed (So is latency and that's awesome as well)

- Still the shop section is alive and well $$$

- Creating a new group after every match no longer needed (Phewwww ..)

- Community still toxic as fuck but hey I guess that's part of every game out there (talking to you all, *ucking campers)

 - 32:9 monitors aren't supported correctly and this results in a *ucking cropped screen (c'mon devs, really??)[/b]


This game's finally been improved and is enjoyable! FINALLY!!!!!


[b]EVEN THOUGH


We don't have to forget those minor improvements took ages (a several-year delay isn't acceptable to me) to be implemented and effective, just because of that I won't change my mind in regards of the recommendation.[/b]



-----------------------


[b][h1]A few things that still need to be URGENTLY fixed in 2021 :[/h1] 



- The ducking overflowing number of hooks that made me crazy for years. How about reducing the number?

- The impossibility to free yourself in time from the killer due to the previous invoked reason (c'mon, what's the point of having dozens of ducking hooks in every map??)

- Once a survivor gets hooked, the killer who ducking camps the spot should be disadvantaged by granting the survivor a WAY LONGER delay BEFORE entering phase 2 AND THEN RIGHT BEFORE the entity takes his life away. FFS this is common sense.[/b]

Long time I was wondering is the game really good to play. Dead By Daylight is divided in half. One half is an amazing game, which you play for hours, other half is bug, laggy game and in that case the only thing you want to do is destroy your computer. After thinking I reply this game, but it needs rework. Not only new killers and survivors, but in major they have to repair hitboxes which provides you to very anger. Final opinion - game is really good but it needs some changes and then it will be at least 9/10, but now only 6,5/10.
We did a pretty good job so far

I changed my review from bad to good because ive heard that the devs are changing the matchmaking and buffing freddy(whole rework) now thats what i call a developer.
anyhow the game is fun and you should buy it. until the changes you might rage quit because of lvl 100 boss pros againts you but leave it at that. the killers are fun to play and the survivors are incredible to play. that is my review
Aparte de todos los bugs que tiene, el juego no esta nada mal
Oui c'est ok, mais bon le camp bof sauf quand c'est moi le tueur.

Very engaging experience, I really haven't experienced any connectivity issues as others posted. Though Im not really ranked well mainly because im not a good escape artist as others on youtube,  i still love the game play and there are more decent players than dicks... graphically decent, runs smooth but sometimes the loading screen freezes and i have to exit the game entirely to restart but to me its not that big a deal. 
i like the progression between the characters as well which i feel for a casual myself are easy to play.
is it worth 20, maybe not but i think a price point on sale of 10 bucks is a better fit.

Devs doing whatever they want to gain more money and don't care about fixing the games problems. Recently they made the survivor ranks in the loby invisible so that a red rank can be paired up someone newly started the game at 15+rank so that they don't dodge the lobby. The matchmaking system is not stable and bad. I don't want to play with people when they don't know sht while killer being red rank and kills them all first 5 minutes. Devs are killing peoples enjoyment and forcing people to go together as swfs. Not recommending to buying this game in it's current condition.

- Bugged
- Unbalanced
- Bugged
- Devs encourage the players to camp and make the experience of the players as worse as possible
- Bugged
- 3/10 games may not lag
- Bugged
- Garbage.
So those were the pros

Now for the cons:
- Waste money if you want something or you'd need about 60h to get 1 t-shirt.
- A payment didn't work well? let's blame something else and not refund you anything.
- Literally garbage behaviour, lost progress because of the creators doing their things wrong? loosing 50 levels on a char, refunds 30 lvls as in-game currency.
- Want to report a griefer because he literally body blocks you in front of the killer? Please send the support a video in order to prove it's true. So make sure you start recording every single game and waste as much storage as possible in order to do their job.
And now gay badges on each hook. I really hoped that my favourite game wouldn't be involved in that rubbish.

I'd recommend Dead by Daylight to anyone who enjoys games where you can use different playstyles depending on what perks you use or how skilled the killer/survivors are. Just like any other game on the market, Dead by Daylight will bring you bugs and glitches, toxic and non-toxic players, fun and awful maps etc. I have 400+ hours and am still pretty noob when it comes to play it correctly and actually escape, most of the time I get wrecked (for the record, it is very infuriating) but I've learned to have fun with the game. As a survivor main you have to deal with this.

I've made friends through DBD, I've laughed till my stomach hurts, I've been sacrificed by team mates who rather let you die than escape as a team, I've had my good items and offerings stolen, I've juked killers around for almost the whole game (very rare though), I've been suuuuper tired after playing several hours without stop (*cough* events) and so much more. Matchmaking is still super frustrating, especially in higher ranks as survivors OR when you play SWF and you're missing 1 or 2 people. However, matchmaking will hopefully be fixed early summer *fingers crossed*

Enjoy the game! :)

Behavior, I am going to say one word, and that one word holds a mountain of emotion for some.
B A L A N C E

Most of the community doesn't even understand what this really means or just focuses on it from their own point of view. For those looking in from the outside, all you need to know is that this is a negative review and I will find where you live and throw a bag of flaming shit in your window if you buy this game or any of its DLC's that are just offensive to gamers. In my opinion, a sense of static "balance" does not exist in this game; the RNG, items, add-ons, and offerings make the game different each time. This stretches the already thin gameplay so that this game does not bore the fuck out of those who play it. But it also means that a "high level" player can only exist for as long as they have crutch add-ons or offerings, no matter what side they play. This alone turns inside out any feeling of progression in this game and always leaves me feeling like I'm just here to receive whatever my opponents want to serve me. Seriously don't buy this game unless it's like 4 dollars and you're bored. Even then there are better options if you look a little bit deeper.

Edit: I own 199 games on steam and this is the only one I regret.
